ygData.subject: Change URI Ordering
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I use Heritrix 3 and I d like to change the URI order during the crawl. Right now I have a custom PrecedencePolicy which assigns precedence to each URI

Hi all,

I use Heritrix 3 and I'd like to change the URI order during the crawl. 
Right now I have a custom PrecedencePolicy which assigns precedence to 
each URI after it is discovered. My understanding is that once the 
precedence is assigned it can not be updated. Is there a way to change 
the precedence in the later stages of the crawl?

I consider replacing the BdbMultipleWorkQueues class with my own 
implementation which replaces BerkleyDB with a simple container for the 
URIs. Is that a plausible solution?

Thanks,
Dimitar
